title: Second Session of the Algerian-Venezuelan Political Consultations / Joint Communiqu√©
text: Mr. Amar Belani, Secretary General of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad of the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria, co-chaired, this Wednesday, February 1, 2023, in Algiers, with Mr. Yuri Alexandre Pimentel Moura, Vice-Minister for Africa at the Ministry of People's Power for Foreign Affairs of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, the second session of the bilateral Political Consultations

This session, which takes place following the official visit to Algeria, on 08 and 09 June 2022, of the President of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, Nicolas Maduro Moros, was an opportunity to review the state of bilateral cooperation and ways and means of promoting it in various areas. The two officials also exchanged views on regional and international issues of common interest.
